    • injectChat

      public void injectChat​(java.net.Socket socket, java.lang.String usernames) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Injecting Chat This method sends the list of messages for the current output after receiving the streams and adding the output to the output list. It then visits all unread messages entered by the user. Finally, by sitting in a loop, it waits to receive a message from the client, and by receiving it and adding the message to the list of messages, it sends it to all available outputs.
      Parameters:
      socket -
      usernames -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
